mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT MOVIE_CODE, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_DATE, MOVIE_NATION, MOVIE_GENRE, MOVIE_DIRECTOR, MOVIE_ACTOR, MOVIE_CNT, MOVIE_FREQ, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY MOVIE_CNT DESC) ROWN FROM MOVIE) WHERE ROWN BETWEEN 1 AND 6
SELECT MOVIE_CODE, MOVIE_IMG FROM MOVIE WHERE MOVIE_CODE=#{no}
